input: Execute a batch request to create two prenote entries for different bank accounts with predefined type codes and notes.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

POST /BankAccountPrenoteEntries HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"BankAccountUUID": "98765432-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01", "TypeCode": "30", "Note": "Monthly Payment"}

POST /BankAccountPrenoteEntries HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"BankAccountUUID": "12345678-abcd-ef01-2345-6789abcdef01", "TypeCode": "40", "Note": "Quarterly Fee"}

--request-separator--
